about_the_game:
Welcome to the Demo


Fleshport is my first full-length game. You wake up in a strange mansion that is curiously empty, aside from an old man that's hosting a dinner "party." Your family is gone and you must traverse the mansion by solving puzzles and hiding from various threats lurking around every corner.

What's On The Menu (Features)


  • Name your pet fish and never see him again.
  • Run and hide from threats that will actively search in different rooms for you.
  • Solve riddles and puzzles inspired by classic horror game titles.
  • Collect teeth.
  • Encounter small, friendly bugs that won't impede your experience too much.

﻿

History


Development on Fleshport officially started in March of 2016. It began as a small passion project as a means to bring myself out of a slump in my life, and it graduated into something far more ambitious than I intended. It's been a long road, and although I hope to keep my next adventure a lot shorter, I feel everything I've learned made it time well spent. I hope you enjoy my creation, I look forward to sharing my worlds with you.

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon instances of blood and gore, as well as mild fantasy violence, are featured in the game.

legal_notice: Fleshport® includes artwork, sound effects, music, and scripts by Zentient®. All rights reserved. Fleshport® includes RPG Maker Vx Ace script resources by Shaz, Melosx, Traverse, Khas, Galv, Yanfly, TheoAllen, DiamondandPlatinum3, Eshra, Kayzee, and Victor.
name: Fleshport Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Memory: 60 MB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

reviews:
“There are no huge scares, but it’s a very unsettling experience, with some very tense moments, great pixel art and an excellent soundtrack.”
Alpha Beta Gamer
short_description: Play as a child lost in a dystopian dimension where cannibalism is a normal facet of every day life. You must solve puzzles and circumvent various threats as you guide our heroine back to her home dimension.
